name: WE Solutions
goal:
WE Solutions specializes in organizational change management and project management using the latest information technology and knowledge management techniques.
We help organisations become smarter and more intelligent.
We enable organisations to learn about online work practice and the behavior of people in virtual worlds.
We help organisations create a business strategy and appropriate goals. We teach and help organisations to communicate, grow, operate and learn more effectively.
We focus on the human aspect of learning and technology.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Mainly following Twitter accounts of Directorate Generals, Agencies, commissioners, European Parliament, ... to get a good understanding of EU initiatives and policies
